銀河英雄伝説外伝　新たなる戦いの序曲[オーヴァチュア]
Legend of the Galactic Heroes: Overture to a New War

fall.title: Ginga Eiyuu Densetsu: Arata naru Tatakai no Overture
fall.title_english: Legend of the Galactic Heroes: Overture to a New War
fall.title_japanese: 銀河英雄伝説外伝　新たなる戦いの序曲[オーヴァチュア]
title_synonyms: LoGH: Overture to a New War
Ginga Eiyu Densetsu Aratanaru Tatakai no Jokyoku
Legend of the Galactic Heroes MOVIE (1993)
fall.synopsis:
Led by Reinhard von Müsel, the Galactic Empire crushes the Free Planets Alliance in the Fourth Battle of Tiamat. Arriving in the Imperial capital of Odin to a hero's welcome, Reinhard's victory earns him a promotion to High Admiral and the distinguished title of Count von Lohengramm. On the other side, Yang Wen-li safely returns to the Alliance capital of Heinessen without fanfare and reunites with his dear friends.

Reinhard and Yang look forward to a long-awaited reprieve. However, at the request of the scheming Duke Otho von Braunschweig, the Imperial High Command orders the new High Admiral to invade the Alliance with a fleet of twenty thousand ships. After the Duke leaks the plan to the Alliance government, three fleets totalling forty thousand ships are sent to counter the incoming attack and recreate the famous Battle of Dagon. But even though Reinhard is outnumbered two to one, he has an ingenious plan—and Yang sees right through it. Will Yang's superiors heed his warning before it is too late?

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

fall.title: Ranma ½ OVA
fall.title_japanese: らんま1/2 OVA
fall.synopsis:
Ranma Saotome continues his search for a way to become a normal teenage boy again. He gets into many hilarious situations involving the many girls in his life. One of the biggest challenges is overcoming the proposals from others who have found a suitable bride for Ranma. But he has his own worries and must muster up the best of his wits and martial arts to keep his sanity. It's not easy being desired by so many women (and men) and not breaking hearts of a few along the way. He just might be able to find it in his heart to confess to Akane or simply find another excuse that he can't marry such a tomboy girl. 

(Source: ANN)

fall.title: Boku no Chikyuu wo Mamotte
fall.title_japanese: ぼくの地球を守って
fall.synopsis:
Alice Sakaguchi once dreamt that she is another person living on the moon. The dream is so strange and so real that Alice can't stop thinking about it. She finds out that some of her classmates are having the same kind of dream. They soon discover that they had been seeing flashes of their past lives as a team of scientists on the moon. Alice and her friends then decide to find the other members and piece together what took place back then. Complications arise when they realize that everything that happened in their previous existence continue to haunt and affect their present lives. 

(Source: ANN)

titles.title: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon R: Make Up! Sailor Senshi
メイクアップ！ セーラー戦士
Sailor Moon R: Make Up! Sailor Guardians

fall.title: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon R: Make Up! Sailor Senshi
fall.title_english: Sailor Moon R: Make Up! Sailor Guardians
fall.title_japanese: メイクアップ！ セーラー戦士
fall.synopsis:
Usagi and Chibiusa overhear two girls talking about the Sailor Senshi after they see a poster. Humorously, as the girls discuss which is the smartest, most elegant, strongest, and the leader of the Senshi, Usagi claims those titles for herself. Chibiusa shakes her head at Usagi's delusion. Clips are shown from the debut of each Sailor Senshi, and that girl's image song is played in the background. When even Tuxedo Mask is mentioned, and the girls go to leave without having mentioned Sailor Moon, Usagi butts in on their conversation and asks them directly about Sailor Moon. The girls give a series of glowing compliments about Sailor Moon, but unlike they did for the other Senshi, they also list her faults. After the girls leave, Usagi sarcastically apologises for being a clumsy cry-baby and then bursts into tears.

(Source: Wikipedia)
fall.background: This was released on Blu ray by Viz Media in 2017.

titles.title: Dragon Ball Z: Zenbu Misemasu Toshi Wasure Dragon Ball Z!
Zenbu Misemasu Toshi Wasure Doragon Boru Zetto!
全部見せます 年忘れドラゴンボールZ!
Looking Back at it All: The Dragon Ball Z Year-End Show!

fall.title: Dragon Ball Z: Zenbu Misemasu Toshi Wasure Dragon Ball Z!
fall.title_english: Looking Back at it All: The Dragon Ball Z Year-End Show!
fall.title_japanese: 全部見せます 年忘れドラゴンボールZ!
title_synonyms: Zenbu Misemasu Toshi Wasure Doragon Boru Zetto!
fall.synopsis:
In this film, which is believed to take place some time around the 25th World Martial Arts Tournament, Gohan and Goten are having a hot bath outside in the middle of winter. Goku (who is still dead) suddenly appears in front of his sons with the help of his Instant Transmission, and joins them in the tub. While there, the three Saiyans reflect back on the events that occurred during the Cell Games. Inside the house after Chi-Chi appeared, Goku tells his sons about Pikkon and the Other World Tournament.

Later, the four members of the Son family appear dressed nicely. Gohan says that the adult division of the Tournament will begin this next year (in 1994), and the special comes to an end.

(Source: Dragon Ball Wikia)

titles.title: 蒼き伝説　シュート！

fall.title: Aoki Densetsu Shoot!
fall.title_japanese: 蒼き伝説　シュート！
fall.synopsis:
Inspired by Yoshiharu Kubo's phenomenal performance that led Kakegawa High School to a miraculous victory in a soccer tournament, Toshihiko Tanaka decides to enter the same school as his idol and join the soccer club, hoping to become as successful as Kubo.

Now a high school freshman, Tanaka is devastated as his expectations suddenly start falling apart. Kubo—the captain of the club—is absent due to illness. To make matters worse, the freshmen are not allowed to practice alongside the sophomores or become regulars on the team. The final nail in the coffin is the reluctance of Tanaka's friends, Kenji Shiraishi and Kazuhiro Hiramatsu, to join him in the club. Although Tanaka and his friends were once known as a deadly soccer trio in their junior high school days, Kenji and Kazuhiro have both quit soccer for personal reasons.

When Tanaka starts to lose hope, an encounter with Kazumi Endo—a girl from his childhood—becomes the unexpected key to his freedom from despair. The disappointed Kazumi wants to see the trio reunite, so she takes matters into her own hands in her mischievous way. Thus, Tanaka's high school soccer career prepares for the kickoff.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

fall.title: The Cockpit
fall.title_japanese: ザ・コクピット
fall.synopsis:
1. Slipstream
About a Luftwaffe pilot who must choose between his duty to his country: to guard a bomber loaded with Germany's final hope of victory... the world's first atomic bomb... or his duty to the world: to let it fall in flames to enemy Spitfires and be a footnote in history. Of course, things are complicated by the plane's other cargo... the woman he loves. 

2. Sonic Boom Squadron
Near the end of the war, Japan has implemented a new weapon -- a human-piloted rocket-propelled flying bomb. Aboard a bomber carrying one of these, young Ensign Nogami awaits his chance to die as a "cherry blossom", a suicide pilot. In a few hours, he will die. The date of his death is set: August 6, 1945.

3. Knight of the Iron Dragon
Two soldiers attempt to reach an air base in order to fulfill a promise despite the fact that it might have been rendered moot in the reality of war.

(Source: ANN)

titles.title: 特捜戦車隊ドミニオン

fall.title: New Dominion Tank Police
fall.title_japanese: 特捜戦車隊ドミニオン
fall.synopsis:
In the follow up to Shirow's classic anime, Al, Leona and their trusty steed, Bonaparte, continue to fight crime in New Port City, alongside the rest of the Tank Police. But a new threat appears in the form of a series of terrorist attacks, using the latest weapons technology. The Tank Police are out-numbered and out-gunned, but Al and Leona set out to discover who or what is behind these attacks. With massive explosions and high-speed chases, Leona often causes more damage than the criminals she pursues.

(Source: ANN)

titles.title: ランス ~砂漠のガーディアン~

fall.title: Rance: Sabaku no Guardian
fall.title_japanese: ランス ~砂漠のガーディアン~
fall.synopsis:
Based on the game by Alice Soft.

While Rance might well be one of the best swordsmen in the world, he has the personality of a rancid turd. He is narcissistic, lecherous, abusive and almost without any redeeming social graces. And his underclad and overabused slave Sill knows this, but she is still in love with him. One day Rance is hired to defend a dusty and forsaken desert village from the repeated attacks of scantly clad and oversexed sorceress intent on the resurrection of a long forgotten demon.

(Source: AniDB, edited)

fall.title: X²: Double X
fall.title_japanese: X² ダブルエックス
fall.synopsis:
X²: Double X is a short (two minutes and forty seconds long) prequel to the theatrical X film. It is a part of four music videos.

The first three are stills of CLAMP's pre-1994 X artwork and live-action sequences. The fourth is animated by Madhouse. Being the only music video that contains actual plot, the fourth video introduces some of the major characters and quickly lashes through the first few X manga (equivalent to X TV series episodes 1–3) which take place before the theatrical movie.

(Source: ANN, edited)

fall.title: Choujikuu Seiki Orguss 02
fall.title_japanese: 超時空世紀オーガス02
fall.synopsis:
Years of political tension and mistrust between the two rival nations of Zafran and Revillia escalate to the point of war. Each nations solution: to gain possession of Decimators, the same ancient robots of war that nearly ended all life on the planet 200 years before. As the war ensues and the leaders of both nations become reluctant to surrender, only the desperate plan of Lean, a young cadet, and Nataruma, a psychically gifted young woman, to alter the timeline of events 200 years before stands the chance between humanity's survival or absolute destruction. 
(Source: ANN)

titles.title: バトルスピリッツ　龍虎の拳

fall.title: Battle Spirits: Ryuuko no Ken
fall.title_japanese: バトルスピリッツ　龍虎の拳
fall.synopsis:
While trying to rescue a cat, martial artist Ryo Sakazaki and his playboy best friend Robert Garcia unwittingly break into a jewel thief's apartment. Moments after entering, they witness the thief being murdered by a group of thugs. Despite fighting their way out and escaping, things go from bad to worse when Ryo and Robert learn that the thugs were working for Mr. Big, the biggest crime boss in South Town.

Not only does Mr. Big believe that the two have stolen the "Eye of Sirius," a priceless diamond, but he has also kidnapped Ryo's younger sister Yuri, and is holding her hostage. Without the diamond and out of options, Ryo and Robert must fight their way past Mr. Big's men and save Yuri before it's too late.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

titles.title: Ushio to Tora: Comical Deformer Gekijou
うしおととら コミカル・デフォルメ劇場
Ushio and Tora: Comically Deformed Theater

fall.title: Ushio to Tora: Comical Deformer Gekijou
fall.title_english: Ushio and Tora: Comically Deformed Theater
fall.title_japanese: うしおととら コミカル・デフォルメ劇場
fall.synopsis: Ushio encounters a strange purple monster that seems to be helpful, Tora deals with a kitten, and finally there is a mass chase, reprising all of the monsters from the OVA series.

titles.title: Sono Kinisasete yo: My My Mai
その気にさせてよ myマイ舞

fall.title: Sono Kinisasete yo: My My Mai
fall.title_japanese: その気にさせてよ myマイ舞
fall.synopsis:
While on the job, it is important to watch how you present yourself as people's perceptions can mean everything. For Mai Waku, an owner of a firm tackling supernatural problems, this simple task can be incredibly difficult. With her unavoidable sex appeal, Mai seems to always find a way to end up naked while working on a case. Dealing with a variety of people from well-known celebrities to innkeepers, Mai cannot seem to avoid precarious situations where she lacks clothes in the presence of her clients.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

fall.title: Konpeki no Kantai
fall.title_japanese: 紺碧の艦隊
fall.synopsis:
Konpeki no Kantai is a Japanese alternate-history original video animation series produced by JC Staff. Based on a 1992 novel by Yoshio Aramaki, the series focuses on a technologically advanced Imperial Japanese Navy and a radically different Pacific War that was brought about by Admiral Isoroku Yamamoto's revival in the past due to unexplained circumstances. The series also features real-life 1940s figures whose first names were changed, such as Winston Churchill to Kingston Churchill and Adolf Hitler to Heinrich von Hitler.

(Source: Wikipedia)

fall.title: Daisuki! Hello Kitty
fall.title_japanese: 大好き！ハローキティ
fall.synopsis: The adventures of a young kitten named Kitty with her twin sister Mimi. It's a variety of adventures, including Kitty in some fairy tales as well.

titles.title: ジャングルの王者ターちゃん

fall.title: Jungle no Ouja Tar-chan
fall.title_japanese: ジャングルの王者ターちゃん
fall.synopsis:
Ta-chan is the king of jungle. He was abandoned in savanna, and has been raised by a chimpanzee, Etekichi. He has a dearest wife, Jane who used to be a top model in New York, but now she looks... Anyway, to protect animals from poachers, Ta-chan is fighting against them with his disciple, Pedro, and a master of Chinese martial arts, Ryo.

This anime is based on the manga with the same title; it begins as a comical parody of Tarzan. The first several episodes are comedies, but the rest of the series consists of (rather) serious episodes.

(Source: AnimeNfo)

titles.title: The Hakkenden: Legend of the Dog Warriors Part 2

fall.title: The Hakkenden: Shin Shou
fall.title_english: The Hakkenden: Legend of the Dog Warriors Part 2
fall.title_japanese: THE八犬伝 新章
fall.synopsis: Second part of The Hakkenden.

fall.title: Fantasia
fall.title_japanese: ふぁんたじあ
fall.synopsis:
Akihiro is a teenaged boy with fantasies. He's about to have date with his girlfriend Miyuki when he finds a strange carpet on his way home. Home, a pretty and over-energetic girl named Malon appears from the carpet. She tells Akihiro about the world of Phantasia and wants to live with Akihiro. But even if Akihiro loves pretty girls, he becomes angry with Malon's magical powers and drives her away. The maniac wizard, Roll, who wants to kill Malon, doesn't help at all.

(Source: ANN)

titles.title: 超神伝説うろつき童子 放浪篇[インフェルノ·ロード]

fall.title: Choujin Densetsu Urotsukidouji: Inferno Road
fall.title_japanese: 超神伝説うろつき童子 放浪篇[インフェルノ·ロード]
fall.synopsis: Directly following the conclusion of Urotsukidoji III, the survivors of the Azuma kingdom genocide travel aboard a futuristic tank with Osaka as the destination. There, they plan to face both the Overfiend and their own fates as well. Along they way, the stumble upon a civilization beyond imagination, where children cruely rule over the adults. It is up to Amano Jyaku to save his friends from this sinister land and its evil ruler, Ellis. Shortly after their encounter, Sui Kaka Ju's sister Yoenhime summons Munhihausen, who transforms her into the menacing Yoenki. At last, she is strong enough to reap revenge on Amano for killing her brother. But Munhihausen has his own hidden agendas. The Urotsukidoji legend will finally reach its climax in Osaka, when Kiojo, the sweet and innocent Himi, and the Chojin meet face to face.

titles.title: Coo: Tooi Umi kara Kita Coo
Coo: Come From a Distant Ocean Coo
Coo 遠い海から来たクー

fall.title: Coo: Tooi Umi kara Kita Coo
fall.title_japanese: Coo 遠い海から来たクー
title_synonyms: Coo: Come From a Distant Ocean Coo
fall.synopsis:
Obata Yousuke lives on Pagopago in the Fiji archipelago with his father Tetsuo, a specialist in oceanographic biology. After a storm strikes the island, Yousuke rides to the lagoon with his Jet Ski and finds a strange baby dinosaur there. He takes it to his father's laboratory and names it Coo.

Coo grows and seems to be a large marine reptile (a baby plesiosaur) which lived there some 65 million years ago. But Coo soon becomes an object of interest for the French secret service, assigned to protect the nuclear interests of France in that otherwise peaceful part of the world. 

(Source: AniDB)

titles.title: タイムボカン王道復古

fall.title: Time Bokan Oudou Fukko
fall.title_japanese: タイムボカン王道復古
fall.synopsis:
A laugh-out-loud hilarious adventure from the studio behind Gatchaman and Speed Racer!

Who has what it takes to be the baddest of the bad? It's evil versus evil as teams of bad guys compete to be the meanest villains ever! Watch and laugh as the Dorombo Gang and their Kitchen Robot take on the worst of the worst in a wacky race to be the greatest villains in anime history! The only force that stands in their way are the superheroes of anime. Will the Gatchaman ninja arrive in time to save the day?

(Source: AniDB)

fall.title: Emblem Take 2
fall.title_japanese: 代紋(エンブレム) TAKE2
fall.synopsis:
Shinjuku, 1983. A member of the Kaeda Yakuza gang, Akutsu Jouji, has lost in a brawl with a university cheering squad, and begs for forgiveness through bitter tears. Since then, nothing has gone well in Jouji's life, until 10 years later in 1993, his friend was ordered to kill him, and as he ran away he killed himself, ending his miserable life.

But when Jouji opened his eyes, he was in Shinjuku in 1983, at the fight with the university students that caused things to go wrong. Now with ten more years of memories and experience, Jouji repels the university students with spirit and wisdom. Now he swears to wear a gold emblem around town, and begins his life anew.

(Source: Hokuto no Gun)

fall.title: Mother: Saigo no Shoujo Eve
fall.title_japanese: MOTHER 最後の少女イヴ
fall.synopsis:
The future is bleak and urbanized. A government super-power holds the keys to all the doors. Hope lies in a secret organization who kidnaps "gifted" children and teaches them to wield their ability to view the life energy of all living things. A young girl befriends a sempai, a street rat comes to rescue her, and two parents wait helplessly to see their daughter one last time...

(Source: AniDB)

titles.title: Fortune Quest: Yo ni mo Shiawase na Boukensha-tachi
フォーチュン・クエスト　～世にも幸せな冒険者たち～

fall.title: Fortune Quest: Yo ni mo Shiawase na Boukensha-tachi
fall.title_japanese: フォーチュン・クエスト　～世にも幸せな冒険者たち～
fall.synopsis:
Fortune Quest is the tale of a bunch of adventurers. Imagine your classic D&D party—Fighter, Thief, Bard, Mage, Healer ...and Porter? Okay, don't know where the Porter comes from, but Pastel and her group of adventurers are broke and need a job. They can't afford to buy any of the adventure modules from the module seller, so they have to take part-time jobs to pay off their debts. And an innocent job to fetch holy water leads to world-threatening danger ...and a white dragon.

(Source: AnimeNfo.com)

fall.title: Heisei Inu Monogatari Bow
fall.title_japanese: 平成イヌ物語バウ
fall.synopsis:
Bow is a homeless dog, who enjoys his carefree life. This dog is no super-hero. He drools when he's hungry, he wags his tail when he's happy, and he barks when he's excited, just like an ordinary dog but even uglier and stupider! His dumb innocence often leads to disaster. But somehow people are charmed by him. School children, a lonesome cartoonist, and a gangster family all play an important role in Bow's life.

(Source: ANN)

titles.title: 楽しいウイロータウン

fall.title: Tanoshii Willow Town
fall.title_japanese: 楽しいウイロータウン
fall.synopsis:
Kenneth Grahame's enchanting novel The Wind in the Willows (1908) is the basis for a series about the happy little world of the animals who live along the riverbank. Toad's boastful nature and the evil ferrets and weasels who live in the Wild Wood threaten everyone's quiet lives until the brave Ratty, Mole, Badger, and Toad band together to ensure that they can all live happily ever after.

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

titles.title: Hello Kitty no Fushigi no Kuni no Alice
Hello Kitty and Friends: Alice in Wonderland
ハローキティの不思議の国のアリス
Hello Kitty in Alice in Wonderland
Hello Kitty y sus Amigos: Alicia en el Pais de las Maravillas

fall.title: Hello Kitty no Fushigi no Kuni no Alice
fall.title_english: Hello Kitty in Alice in Wonderland
fall.title_japanese: ハローキティの不思議の国のアリス
title_synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: Alice in Wonderland
fall.synopsis: Adaption of Lewis Caroll's Alice in Wonderland with the famous cat as the heroine.

titles.title: 超音戦士ボーグマン2 [SECOND] -新世紀2058-

fall.title: Chouon Senshi Borgman 2: Shinseiki 2058
fall.title_japanese: 超音戦士ボーグマン2 [SECOND] -新世紀2058-
fall.synopsis:
In 2058, the menace of the Youma (demons) returns under the evil leadership of the Master. A new generation of Borgman, under the leadership of Chuck Sweager, is mankind's only hope of stopping the plague of evil before it consumes all of Megalocity. But Ken, an unwilling recruit to the Borgman, may have more in common with the enemy than with humankind...

(Source: Orphan Fansubs)

titles.title: しましまとらのしまじろう

fall.title: Shima Shima Tora no Shimajirou
fall.title_japanese: しましまとらのしまじろう
fall.synopsis: Shimajiro a tiger boy, Mimirin a rabbit girl, Torippii a parrot boy, Ramurin a sheep girl has an adventure in challenge island where they live.

titles.title: Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru: Owarinaki Toki no Monogatari
Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru: The Never-Ending Tale of Time
魔神英雄伝ワタル　終わりなき時の物語

fall.title: Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru: Owarinaki Toki no Monogatari
fall.title_japanese: 魔神英雄伝ワタル　終わりなき時の物語
title_synonyms: Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru: The Never-Ending Tale of Time
fall.synopsis:
The story is about a 9-year-old boy named Wataru Ikusabe  who is magically transported to a magical realm of the gods called Sokaizan which he is supposed to save. He also befriends many of the Soukaizan natives, and forms some very strong friendship bonds. 

(Source: Wikipedia)

titles.title: 美味しんぼ　日米コメ戦争

fall.title: Oishinbo: Nichibei Kome Sensou
fall.title_japanese: 美味しんぼ　日米コメ戦争
fall.synopsis: The Oishinbo gang takes time off from the normal culinary wars to get involved with a political dispute about American rice imports. The economic conflict between a pushy US Senator from California and a nationalistic Japanese politician is further complicated by concerns about the cumulative effect of pesticide use in both American and Japanese agriculture.

fall.title: Shibai Taroka
fall.title_japanese: しばいたろか
fall.synopsis:
There is a new student at Oobu High School. His name is Yakuda Daigo. With his buff body and a tough looking face that can make every one run, soon rumors spread about him. Some says he's a gang leader, others say he is involved with Yakuza business, still more say he rapes, steals and likes beating people.

There are only a handful of people who know who Yakuda really is, including Manami-a. She is a girl Yakuda fell in love with. Yakuda loves to cook and he likes cute things. He also enjoys gardening, crafting and adores pets. He is a very caring person. He always carries around a cute sewing kit and a cute first-aid kit around.

However, with many unfortunate events, he often gets involved with a gang fight or a criminal, along with other coincidental things that happens around him. People always assume the worse for him.

Will everyone find out who he really is?

titles.title: Ahiru no Pekkle no Sindbad no Bouken
Hello Kitty and Friends: The Adventures of Sinbad
アヒルのペックルのシンドバッドの冒険
Pekkle in the Adventures of Sinbad

fall.title: Ahiru no Pekkle no Sindbad no Bouken
fall.title_english: Pekkle in the Adventures of Sinbad
fall.title_japanese: アヒルのペックルのシンドバッドの冒険
title_synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: The Adventures of Sinbad
fall.synopsis: Pekkle re-creates the Adventures of Sinbad.

titles.title: Aoi Kioku: Manmou Kaitaku to Shounen-tachi
蒼い記憶 満蒙開拓と少年たち

fall.title: Aoi Kioku: Manmou Kaitaku to Shounen-tachi
fall.title_japanese: 蒼い記憶 満蒙開拓と少年たち
fall.synopsis: A class of Japanese youths volunteer for the war effort during WWII, but then get stranded in Manchuria.

fall.title: Bonobono

fall.synopsis: The first theatrical Bonobono movie.

titles.title: Hello Kitty and Friends: The Dream Thief
ハローキティの夢どろぼう
Hello Kitty in The Dream Thief

fall.title: Hello Kitty no Yume Dorobou
fall.title_english: Hello Kitty in The Dream Thief
fall.title_japanese: ハローキティの夢どろぼう
title_synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: The Dream Thief
fall.synopsis: A mysterious black creature is stealing dreams and causing Mimmy and Kitty to be sleep deprived. It's up to Kitty to catch the thief.

fall.title: Yokohama Bakkure-tai
fall.title_japanese: 横浜ばっくれ隊
fall.synopsis:
It's all gags and fighting as gangster Tsunematsu Narita (the "biggest idiot in Yokohama") causes havoc in the neighborhood with his two henchmen. 

Based on the Shonen Champion manga by Tetsu Kusumoto.

 (Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

titles.title: Kiki to Lala no Hakuchouza no Ohimesama
Kiki & Lala in The Princess of the Cygnus Constellation
キキとララの白鳥座のお姫さま

fall.title: Kiki to Lala no Hakuchouza no Ohimesama
fall.title_japanese: キキとララの白鳥座のお姫さま
title_synonyms: Kiki & Lala in The Princess of the Cygnus Constellation
fall.synopsis: In this episode, Kiki and Lala are learning about stars and constellations, and even meeting the Queen of Stars herself.

titles.title: Tsuyoshi Shikkari Shinasai: Tsuyoshi no Time Machine de Shikkari Shinasai
ツヨシしっかりしなさい ツヨシのタイムマシーンでしっかりしなさい

fall.title_japanese: ツヨシしっかりしなさい ツヨシのタイムマシーンでしっかりしなさい
fall.synopsis: Tsuyoshi Shikkari Shinasai movie.

titles.title: Kerokero Keroppi no Kero Kero House no Himitsu
Hello Kitty and Friends: The Frog's Secret House
Keroppi and Friends: The Frog's Secret House
けろけろけろっぴのけろけろハウスのひみつ
Keroppi in the Frog's Secret House

fall.title: Kerokero Keroppi no Kero Kero House no Himitsu
fall.title_english: Keroppi in the Frog's Secret House
fall.title_japanese: けろけろけろっぴのけろけろハウスのひみつ
title_synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: The Frog's Secret House
Keroppi and Friends: The Frog's Secret House
fall.synopsis: On a rainy day Keroppi and friends find their elders' old secret club house. But the house ends up being more magical than they thought.

titles.title: Kiki to Lala no Hoshi no Dance Shoes
キキとララの星のダンスシューズ

fall.title: Kiki to Lala no Hoshi no Dance Shoes
fall.title_japanese: キキとララの星のダンスシューズ
fall.synopsis: It's dancing time for Kiki and Lala.

titles.title: Hello Kitty and Friends: Exciting Birthday
ポチャッコのわくわくバースデイ

fall.title: Pochacco no Wakuwaku Birthday
fall.title_japanese: ポチャッコのわくわくバースデイ
title_synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: Exciting Birthday
fall.synopsis: It's the day before Pochacco's birthday and he's skateboarding around looking for his friends. He hopes to have a grand party with them the next day, but they all seem busy!

titles.title: Hello Kitty no Okaze wo Hiita Santa-san
ハローキティのおかぜをひいたサンタさん

fall.title: Hello Kitty no Okaze wo Hiita Santa-san
fall.title_japanese: ハローキティのおかぜをひいたサンタさん
fall.synopsis: Santa-san has caught a cold after falling into a lake. It's up to Kitty and her friends to make sure Christmas happens on time.

titles.title: Pochacco no Ninjin Hata wa Oosawagi
Hello Kitty and Friends: The Excitement at the Carrot Patch
Pochakko no Ninjin Hata wa Oosawagi
ポチャッコのにんじん畑は大騒ぎ
Pochacco in The Excitement at the Carrot Patch

fall.title: Pochacco no Ninjin Hata wa Oosawagi
fall.title_english: Pochacco in The Excitement at the Carrot Patch
fall.title_japanese: ポチャッコのにんじん畑は大騒ぎ
title_synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: The Excitement at the Carrot Patch
Pochakko no Ninjin Hata wa Oosawagi
fall.synopsis: Pochacco and friends open up a carrot land together. One day, they find that all carrots are stolen by someone. Because of this event, they start to suspect each other. Who is the thief?

titles.title: Hello Kitty to Miyou: Nihon Mukashibanashi
ハローキティと見よう日本むかしばなし

fall.title: Hello Kitty to Miyou: Nihon Mukashibanashi
fall.title_japanese: ハローキティと見よう日本むかしばなし
fall.synopsis: Hello Kitty themed Japanese fables.

titles.title: Ookami to Nanahiki no Ko Yagi
おおかみと７ひきのこやぎ

fall.title: Ookami to Nanahiki no Ko Yagi
fall.title_japanese: おおかみと７ひきのこやぎ
fall.synopsis: Yasuji Mori's posthumous work released on the 4th volume of the "Anime Art Video Collection" by Nippon Columbia. It follows the original Brothers Grimm fable of The Wolf and the Seven Young Goats.

fall.title: Aika-chan no Chikyuu
fall.title_japanese: 愛華ちゃんの地球
fall.synopsis:
The author of the manga Secrets of the World was only 12 years old, and she died days after completing it. Aika Tsubota's parents published her environmentally themed story in her memory, and this one-shot anime was the eventual result, sponsored in part by a charity opposing the pollution of the oceans. In 1995, Secrets of the World itself was animated as a two-part video series under the auspices of the Japanese Department of the Environment.

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

titles.title: Gakken ka Nani ka no Mukashi no Video
Gakken or Some Kind of Old Video
学研の頭脳開発ビデオ

fall.title: Gakken no Zunou Kaihatsu Video
fall.title_japanese: 学研の頭脳開発ビデオ
title_synonyms: Gakken ka Nani ka no Mukashi no Video
Gakken or Some Kind of Old Video
fall.synopsis: Gakken's Brain Development Video is a series of educational OVAs teaching various things to pre-school and kindergarten aged children. They include items like "Nakayoku Dekiru yo" which teaches playing nice together or "Wakuwaku ABC" which teaches the English alphabet. 18 VHS tapes were created but only 17 were animated, "Wakuwaku Eigo Game" was the live-action one with real Western child actors.

fall.title: Gomen yo! Wanwan
fall.title_japanese: ごめんよ！わんわん
fall.synopsis: Kids playing kick-the-can accidentally hit a dog that chases them across town. They try to beg forgiveness from it.

titles.title: スーパースターを夢見て

fall.title: Superstar wo Yumemite
fall.title_japanese: スーパースターを夢見て
fall.synopsis: A music video that aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program. The song is by CHIHARU.

fall.title: Cholong-iui Yesnal-Yeohaeng
fall.title_japanese: 초롱이의 옛날여행

fall.title: Kohaku no Mahou
fall.title_japanese: 琥珀の魔法
fall.synopsis: A music video that aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program. The song is by EPO.

fall.title: Shinkansen (Tab Eater Remix)
fall.title_japanese: 新幹線（TAB EATER MIX）
fall.synopsis: Music video for the song Shinkansen (Tab Eater Remix) by Denki Groove.

titles.title: 僕たちのコレクション

fall.title: Bokutachi no Collection
fall.title_japanese: 僕たちのコレクション
fall.synopsis: Music video for the song Bokutachi no Collection by KATSUMI (Katsumi Watanabe) that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program.
